ygData.subject: Re: OT-High Speed Access
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is why I have taken to turning particle density OFF in a large group and always tell my group members they should too.  I have a PIII-450 with a Viper
ygData.messageBody:
>From: John Kim <kim@...>

>The worst are are effect spells. Those will drop my Celeron
>450 with Voodoo3 card (overclocked to 3000 speed) to about 2
>frames per second, even at low particle density.
>
>John H. Kim
>kim@...

This is why I have taken to turning particle density OFF in a large group
and always tell my group members they should too. I have a PIII-450 with a
Viper 770 and 256MB of ram and I still get massive lag in caster heavy
battles. The only problem with PD being off is that many songs and spells
give no visual clue. Verant should make it so there is something, even a
little glow. As it is I have to pay very close attention to the text
messages in battle to weave well, it can get very tedious.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
